FuncDef:
The redirect command enables the redirection function for user interfaces.
The undo redirect command disables the redirection function for user interfaces.
By default, the redirection function is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables the IPv4 redirection function for user interfaces.
-

Enables the redirection function for user interfaces.
-

Enables the IPv6 redirection function for user interfaces.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the redirection function for user interfaces, run the redirect command in the user interface view. The redirect enable command can enable both IPv4 and IPv6 redirection functions.
If the number of the port to be redirected has been registered or used, enabling the redirection function fails. In this case, run the display tcp status command to check the usage information about the port.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
